page.title: 08A RUSHENDEN SPECTACULAR
page.content: It was the Rushenden Spectacular last Saturday July 20th. There was a big Baby Show which had over 60 babies. There were all sorts of stalls like hoop-la and lucky dip. You could even win a goldfish. We watched the tug-of-war teams. That is a competition where teams of men pull as hard as they can at each end of a rope. The ones that pull the hardest are the winners. There was a fancy dress competition but I didn't go in for it. Later on when it was dark we went on a torchlight procession from Rushenden to Queenborough. It was good fun although my torch went out before we reached the end.
